short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Press the ctrl,then draw a circle with the mouse,the content will be put on clipboard.Especially useful for text in image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hi, this is Circle Select plugin,which is easy to use.
It can help you select text,especially the text in the image.
Press the ctrl key,and draw a circle with the mouse.
The text in the circle will be put on the clipboard.
You can also draw a circle in a pictue.
When you don't want to use it,you can click the plugin icon to turn on/off it.
Now, search for "mouse select" in Google plugin Store.
